summary: In 1967, the UN established a system to promote and protect human rights around the world. It selects independent experts and gives them a mandate to report and advise on specific human rights issues. As of 2024, the UN had 46 thematic (such as human trafficking) and 14 country-specific mandates. This Q&A report provides information on this system. For example: These human rights experts may...
title: United Nations: Information on Independent Human Rights Experts and Their Work
